title: website: tip.golang.org auto-scaling is broken
body:
Please turn off auto-scaling or fix the health check handler.

It's totally bogus that our public Go 1.6 docs we're linking to are down half the time.

The health check handler from last night didn't work:

![screen shot 2015-12-18 at 10 22 28 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2621/11903903/67acda0e-a571-11e5-8fe6-7b977ba0fa6c.png)
